application.name: 客服消息群发
application.description: 利用客服消息接口,给48小时内有交互的用户,进行消息群发
application.author: zjl

manifest.install:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ims_zjl_mass_custom_msg_options; CREATE TABLE `ims_zjl_mass_custom_msg_options` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `add_time` int(11) NOT NULL, `type` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `options` text NOT NULL, `success_count` int(11) NOT NULL, `total` int(11) NOT NULL, `cache_name` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `thread_count` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ims_zjl_mass_custom_msg_thread_cache; CREATE TABLE `ims_zjl_mass_custom_msg_thread_cache` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `tid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `add_time` int(11) NOT NULL, `option_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `options` text NOT NULL, `success_count` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `total` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
